caption.p: Effect of crude EtOAc extract and fractions no. 6–8 on MDA-MB-231 cell apoptosis and cell-cycle arrest. ( A– D) Cell apoptosis and cell cycle progression analyzed by using Muse cell analyzer. Cells were incubated with crude EtOAc extract or fractions no. 6–8 at 150 µg/mL for 24 h. For untreated control, cells were incubated with complete medium alone. For positive control, cells were incubated with doxorubicin (1.5 µM). ( E) Western blot analysis. ( F) mRNA expression by RT-PCR. Cells were incubated with fraction no. 7 for 24 h. One-way ANOVA was performed with multiple comparison correction (Dunnett test). Data represent the mean ± SEM of three independent experiments. (* p < 0.05, ** p < 0.01, *** p < 0.001). EtOAc, ethyl acetate; Fr, fraction; Dox, doxorubicin; NC, negative control; Fr, fraction; β-actin, beta-actin.
